description: Chart shows the percent of population and number of poor below the Kenya poverty line of Ksh 1,562 per month in rural areas; and Ksh 2,913 in urban areas per per person per month; based on estimated expenditures on minimum provisions of food and non-food items.

name: District Poverty Data KIHBS, 2005/6
